body: They took a corner in the school's gymnasium, finding forest green city-issued cots for themselves and their four children. They unfolded their blue city-issued fleece blankets, stamped with the city's official seal, opened their paper cartons of water and settled in for the night. For Kevin and Sharon Harvey, the decision to seek shelter at an
title: School Gym Shelters Evacuees From Irene

body: A century ago, Israel Zangwill popular- ized the term in his play, ''The Melting Pot.'' From a Lower East Side rooftop, the protagonist proclaimed, ''What is the glory of Rome and Jerusalem, where all nations and races come to worship and look back, compared with the glory of America, where all races and nations come to labor and look forward?''New
title: Then as Now: New York's Shifting Ethnic Mosaic

body: As a lifelong resident of Brighton Beach, Brooklyn, Gary Atlas would always enjoy seeing the robust old Russians marching up the beach, dripping and content after a frigid dip in the wintry ocean. So in September 2007, while unemployed and tending to his mother, Enid, who was dying of emphysema, Mr. Atlas sought relief from depression by running on
title: SWEAT; Workout for a World of Grief
